markdown:
Keysight Technologies is Hiring!
================================

by [ecepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/ecepic/ "Posts by ecepic")
 | Mar 6, 2021 | [CMED](https://fke.utm.my/category/cmed/)
, [COMM](https://fke.utm.my/category/comm/)
, [ECE](https://fke.utm.my/category/ece/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)
, [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/image001-1.png)

Keysight is currently actively hiring and we would like your support to share to your fresh graduate student who is looking for a job. Please find attached the job description of Keysight opening.

**Action required from student:**

Student to submit their resume to [joshua.tan@keysight.com](mailto:joshua.tan@keysight.com)
 with the email header mark: **Looking For A Job: “Keysight \*Job Title”** information included such as:  
1.      CGPA  
2.      Availability to start work  
3.      Technical skillset  
4.      Final year project \* Job title refer to Job Description attachment

Student to state down minimum 2 job preference (as listed below) in email by **11 March 2021 (Friday)**:

[Test Engineer 1](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Test-Engineer-39674.pdf)

[Test Engineer 2](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Test-Engineer-39732.pdf)

[Material Engineer](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Materials-Engineer-39630.pdf)

[NPI Product Engineer](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/NPI-Product-Engineer-39615.pdf)

[Product Engineer 1](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Product-Engineer-39434.pdf)

[Product Engineer 2](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Product-Engineer-39457.pdf)

[Product Engineer 3](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Product-Engineer-39864.pdf)

[Process Mechanical Engineer](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Process-Mechanical-Engineer-39507.pdf)

[Quality Engineer](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Quality-Engineer-39677.pdf)

[RF Product Engineer](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/RF-Product-Engineer-39617.pdf)

Close this module

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/CSI-FKE-2025-1.jpeg)
